name: WWV
uniques: Instantly provides [8] [War Weariness] <upon being defeated> <vs [non-[Barbarians]] units> <in [Friendly Land] tiles> <when at war>
Instantly provides [20] [War Weariness] <upon being defeated> <vs [non-[Barbarians]] units> <in [non-[Friendly Land]] tiles> <when at war>
Instantly provides [150] [War Weariness] <upon conquering a city>
Instantly consumes [16] [War Weariness] <upon defeating a [non-[Barbarians]] unit> <in [Friendly Land] tiles>
Instantly consumes [8] [War Weariness] <upon defeating a [non-[Barbarians]] unit> <in [Foreign Land] tiles>

name: Fearless

Instantly consumes [30] [War Weariness] <upon defeating a [non-[Barbarians]] unit> <in [Friendly Land] tiles>
Instantly consumes [20] [War Weariness] <upon defeating a [non-[Barbarians]] unit> <in [non-[Friendly Land]] tiles>
